item.title: 西班牙因德意志银行出售衍生品罚款 1000 万欧元
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）被西班牙证券监管机构 CNMV 罚款 1000 万欧元（1030 万美元），原因是德意志银行向客户销售衍生产品，而这些客户后来表示他们并不了解这些产品，并因此蒙受了巨大损失。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG was fined €10 million ($10.3 million) by Spain’s securities regulator CNMV for selling derivatives to clients who later said they didn’t understand the products and suffered steep losses as a result.】

item.title: 希思罗机场将宣布加快扩建，并承诺优先发展英国钢铁业
item.description: 伦敦希思罗机场将公布一项短期扩建计划，其中包括及时承诺优先使用受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税威胁的英国钢铁，在第三条跑道建成之前为该枢纽提供潜在的推动力。【原文：London’s Heathrow airport will unveil a short-term expansion plan including a timely commitment to prioritize British steel under threat from US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, offering the hub a potential boost before a third runway is built.】

item.title: BC Partners 据称将为新旗舰基金募集高达 60 亿欧元的资金
item.description: 私募股权公司 BC Partners 计划为其最新旗舰基金募集 50 亿欧元（52 亿美元）至 60 亿欧元的资金，知情人士透露，该公司希望借助最近在资产剥离方面取得的成功来应对依然困难的筹资环境。【原文：Private equity firm BC Partners is planning to seek €5 billion ($5.2 billion) to €6 billion for its latest flagship fund, people with knowledge of the matter said, counting on its recent success in divesting assets to navigate a still-difficult fundraising environment.】

item.title: 机构称监管负担拖累加拿大经济增长
item.description: 加拿大中央统计局称，在 15 年的时间里，不断增加的规章制度使加拿大商业部门的产出增长减少了近 2 个百分点。【原文：The rising number of rules and regulations shaved almost 2 percentage points off the growth in output from Canada’s business sector over a 15-year period, the country’s central statistics agency said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称通货紧缩已步入正轨，但贸易带来风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，尽管全球贸易摩擦继续构成风险，但通胀回落正在取得进展。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said the retreat in inflation is progressing, though global trade friction continues to posing risks.】

item.title: 安大略省表示将禁止中国参与矿产和能源交易
item.description: 加拿大最大省份的领导人表示，如果他所在的政党在本月晚些时候获得连任，政府将禁止中国组件参与能源项目。【原文：The leader of Canada’s largest province said the government will ban Chinese components from energy projects if his party is reelected later this month.】

item.title: Redwood 43 亿美元信贷基金因阿根廷和菜肴收益 17
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一封投资者信，红木资本管理公司（Redwood Capital Management）的主基金去年收益约为 17%，主要是受阿根廷、石化生产商 TPC Group 和卫星电视供应商 Dish Network 等不良债权的推动。【原文：Redwood Capital Management’s master fund gained about 17% last year, driven by wagers on distressed credits including Argentina, petrochemical producer TPC Group and satellite TV provider Dish Network, according to an investor letter seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 津巴布韦股票吸引力下降，ZiG流动性挤压加剧
item.description: 津巴布韦股票曾一度受到当地投资者的青睐，被视为对冲通胀飙升和汇率波动的保值工具，但现在正逐渐失去吸引力。【原文：Zimbabwean stocks, once favored by local investors as a hedge against surging inflation and exchange-rate volatility, are losing their appeal.】

item.title: 削减开支的幅度到底有多大？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 加拿大保守党领袖誓言扩大北极地区的硬实力
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）誓言扩大加拿大在北极地区的军事存在，支持特朗普政府呼吁增加国防开支以对抗俄罗斯和中国，同时维护北方国家在这一偏远地区的主权。【原文：Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vowed to expand Canada’s military presence in the Arctic, backing the Trump administration’s call for more defense spending to counter Russia and China while asserting the northern nation’s sovereignty in the remote region.】

item.title: 赫兹开始与债券持有人就补偿诉讼进行谈判
item.description: 赫兹公司周一表示，该公司已启动谈判，以解决部分债券持有人要求的超过 2.7 亿美元的补偿金诉讼。【原文：Hertz Corp. has kicked off negotiations to settle litigation surrounding a make-whole payout of over $270 million that has been demanded by some bondholders, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: OpenAI 已就 DeepSeek 调查与政府官员对话
item.description: 据一位高层管理人员透露，OpenAI 已经与政府官员就该公司正在进行的关于中国 DeepSeek 是否未经授权使用了从 ChatGPT 制造商的技术中获取的数据的调查进行了沟通。【原文：OpenAI has spoken to government officials about the company’s ongoing investigation into whether China’s DeepSeek used data obtained in an unauthorized manner from the ChatGPT maker’s technology, according to a top executive.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查显示通胀预期在关税前有所上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的月度调查显示，在特朗普政府宣布加征关税之前，美国消费者的长期通胀预期在1月份有所上升。【原文：US consumers’ long-term inflation expectations edged higher in January ahead of tariff announcements by the Trump administration, a monthly Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey showed.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会 X 账户因比特币 ETF 帖子被黑导致认罪
item.description: 阿拉巴马州的一名男子承认参与黑客攻击美国证券交易委员会的 X 账户，并在社交媒体上发送了一篇假帖子，宣布批准首批现货比特币交易所交易基金。【原文：An Alabama man pleaded guilty to participating in the hack of the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s X account that involved sending a fake social media post announcing the authorization of the first-ever spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 恢复投资级评级后，Cemex 首席执行官下台
item.description: 墨西哥水泥公司（Cemex SAB）首席执行官费尔南多-冈萨雷斯（Fernando González）在全球最大的水泥生产商之一任职三十多年后即将卸任。该公司在一份声明中说，冈萨雷斯将于 4 月 1 日由 Jaime Muguiro 接替，后者是 Cemex 美国业务的现任主管。【原文：Mexico’s Cemex SAB Chief Executive Officer Fernando González is stepping down after more than three decades at one of the world’s largest cement makers. González will be replaced April 1 by Jaime Muguiro, who is the current head of Cemex’s US operations, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 微软因竞争对手必应访问权限遭法国反垄断调查
item.description: 微软公司正在接受法国反垄断机构的调查，原因是该美国科技巨头担心，当较小的竞争对手付费在自己的搜索引擎产品中使用必应技术时，会降低搜索结果的质量。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is under investigation from the French antitrust authority amid concerns the US tech giant is degrading the quality of results when smaller rivals pay to use Bing technology in their own search-engine products.】

item.title: 能源传输公司为德克萨斯州人工智能数据中心供应天然气
item.description: 管道运营商 Energy Transfer LP 将直接向 CloudBurst Data Centers, Inc.【原文：Pipeline operator Energy Transfer LP will provide natural gas directly to CloudBurst Data Centers, Inc. as companies prepare for an expected boom in power demand from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 信贷专家瞄准大宗交易，征服 8 万亿美元市场
item.description: 投资组合交易背后日益增长的势头激起了量化投资者的希望，这将帮助他们最终征服一个多年来一直抵制他们的方法的资产类别：公司债券。【原文：The growing momentum behind portfolio trading is stirring hopes among quantitative investors it will help them finally conquer an asset class that has resisted their methods for years: corporate bonds.】

item.title: Lyft 最快将于 2026 年在达拉斯推出 Mobileye Robotaxis 自动驾驶汽车
item.description: Lyft 公司将在去年 11 月首次宣布的合作基础上，与技术供应商、英特尔公司分拆出来的 Mobileye Global 公司合作，最快于 2026 年在达拉斯推出无人驾驶乘车服务。【原文：Lyft Inc. will launch driverless rides with technology vendor and Intel Corp. spinoff Mobileye Global Inc. in Dallas as soon as 2026, building on a partnership that was first announced last November.】

item.title: 贝莱德任命 Aubenas 为新兴市场固定收益部主管
item.description: 贝莱德公司任命 Michel Aubenas 为新兴市场固定收益部门主管，接替即将离开这家全球最大资产管理公司出任黎巴嫩经济部长的 Amer Bisat。【原文：BlackRock Inc. named Michel Aubenas as head of emerging markets fixed income, replacing Amer Bisat, who’s leaving the world’s largest asset manager to become Lebanon’s economy minister.】

item.title: 新兴市场风险利差降至科威德暴涨以来最低水平
item.description: 对世界上一些风险最高国家的垃圾级债务的热捧，使新兴市场的风险溢价降至五年前科维德冲击之前的最低水平。【原文：The craze for junk-rated debt of some of the world’s riskiest countries has sent an emerging-market risk premium to the lowest level since before the Covid shock five years ago.】

item.title: 在南非的美国公司呼吁在特朗普的争论中保持 "头脑冷静
item.description: 南非美国商会负责人表示，与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的不和有可能危及对两国都有利的重要战略关系。【原文：The head of the American Chamber of Commerce in South Africa said a feud with US President Donald Trump risks a strategically important relationship that benefits both nations.】

item.title: 瑞典养老基金 AP2 将所持 Northvolt 股份减记为零
item.description: 根据瑞典国有养老基金 AP2 的年度报告，该基金已经减记了其在破产电池制造商 Northvolt AB 公司的全部股份。【原文：Sweden’s state-owned pension fund AP2 has written down its entire stake in bankrupt battery maker Northvolt AB, according to the fund’s annual report.】

item.title: 礼来利用高级市场为购买抗癌药物提供资金
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. is tapping the US investment-grade bond market on Monday to help finance its roughly $2.5 billion purchase of a cancer drug from Scorpion Therapeutics Inc.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称原油产量进一步低于欧佩克+的目标
item.description: 俄罗斯数据显示，1 月份的石油产量进一步低于欧佩克+配额。【原文：Russian data show oil production in January slipped further below the nation’s OPEC+ quota, according to people familiar with the figures.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金看涨美股，买入科技股
item.description: 对冲基金上周成为美股的大买家，在盈利报告强于预期的情况下，一改此前的看跌立场。【原文：Hedge funds emerged as big buyers of US stocks last week, shifting away from a previously bearish stance in the wake of stronger-than-expected earnings reports.】

item.title: 欧洲每桶 100 美元的天然气价格让烧油更有吸引力
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格的飙升使工业用油更具成本效益，从而有可能增加该地区对桶油的需求。【原文：Europe’s soaring gas prices are making it more cost-effective to burn oil for industrial use, potentially boosting the region’s demand for barrels.】

item.title: Saylor's Strategy 在发布亏损后恢复购买比特币
item.description: Strategy 是一家自称为比特币财政公司的公司，不久前还被称为 MicroStrategy 公司，该公司表示在过去七天里收购了 7.422 亿美元的数字资产，恢复了从 10 月下旬开始的每周收购。【原文：Strategy, the self-styled Bitcoin Treasury company that until recently was called MicroStrategy Inc., said it acquired $742.2 million of the digital asset over the past seven days, resuming weekly purchases that began in late October.】

item.title: 贝莱德高收益债券基金成为主动管理 ETF
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正在将其高收益市政债券基金转换为主动管理型 ETF，以期通过提供成本更低、流动性更强的投资工具来增加管理资产。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is converting its high-yield municipal bond fund into an actively-managed ETF in a bid to grow assets under management by providing a lower-cost and more liquid investment vehicle.】

item.title: 特朗普关税重创黄金，南非股市再创新高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新关税承诺刺激金价上涨之际，投资者忽视了美国冻结援助的消息，南非基准股指创下历史新高。【原文：South Africa’s benchmark stock index headed for a record as investors overlooked a US aid freeze amid a rise in gold prices stoked by President Donald Trump’s latest tariff pledge.】
